com.oneops.cli

Class Term

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oneops.cli.Term

  • public class Term
extends Object
    System terminal utilities
    Author:
    Suresh

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static org.jline.reader.LineReader lineReader
      Terminal reader, allows reading lines from a terminal, with full input/line editing.
      static org.jline.terminal.Terminal sysTerm
      Returns the system terminal that handle an OS terminal window.
      static TermSignalHandler termHandler
      Default terminal signal handler.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void clearScreen()
      Clear the screen.
      static String info()
      Prints the terminal info useful for logging.
      static void tPrintln(String string)
      Prints the string to terminal and flush.
      static void writeAtBottom(String string)
      Writes the input [string] to console simultaneously doing the input (typing).

    • Field Detail

      • sysTerm

        public static final org.jline.terminal.Terminal sysTerm
        Returns the system terminal that handle an OS terminal window. There is only a single system terminal for a given JVM, the one that has been used to launch the JVM.

      • lineReader

        public static final org.jline.reader.LineReader lineReader
        Terminal reader, allows reading lines from a terminal, with full input/line editing.

      • termHandler

        public static final TermSignalHandler termHandler
        Default terminal signal handler.

    • Method Detail

      • writeAtBottom

        public static void writeAtBottom(String string)
        Writes the input [string] to console simultaneously doing the input (typing). This will make sure that the output doesn't interleave with the input text.

      • clearScreen

        public static void clearScreen()
        Clear the screen.

      • info

        public static String info()
        Prints the terminal info useful for logging.

      • tPrintln

        public static void tPrintln(String string)
        Prints the string to terminal and flush.
